00041 /** Smarty */
00042 require_once 'Smarty/Smarty.class.php';
00043 
00044 /**
00045  * Display backend for the Smarty templating engine
00046  *
00047  * @category   ASOworx
00048  * @package    ASO
00049  * @copyright  Copyright (c) A Small Orange Software (http://www.asmallorange.com)
00050  * @license    http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php MIT License
00051  */
00052 class ASO_Display_Smarty
00053 {
00054     /**
00055      * Smarty instance
00056      * @var Smarty
00057      */
00058     private $smarty = null;
00059 
00060     /** 
00061      * Constructor
00062      *
00063      * Instantiates Smarty for later awesomeness
00064      */
00065     public function __construct()
00066     {    
00067         $this->smarty = new Smarty();
00068         
00069         $this->smarty->template_dir = './app/views/';
00070         $this->smarty->compile_dir = './var/cache/';
00071         $this->smarty->config_dir = './var/cache/';
00072         $this->smarty->cache_dir = './var/cache/';
00073         
00074         $this->smarty->register_function( 'error', array( 'ASO_Error', 'formatError' ) );
00075     }
00076 
00077     /**
00078      * Display the data through Smarty
00079      *
00080      * @param array $view The template to use
00081      * @param array $data The data to be used in the template
00082      * @return void
00083      */
00084     public function runDisplay( $view, $data )
00085     {
00086         $this->smarty->assign( $data );
00087         $this->smarty->assign( 'input', ASO_Input::filterInput() );
00088         $this->smarty->assign( 'sess', ASO_Registry('sess') );
00089         
00090         // GZip compression
00091         //ob_start( 'ob_gzhandler' );
00092         
00093         if( file_exists( 'app/views/global.tpl' ) && $view != 'error' && $view != '404' )
00094         {        
00095             $this->smarty->assign( 'templatefile', $view . '.tpl' );
00096             $this->smarty->display( 'global.tpl' );
00097         }
00098         else
00099         {
00100             $this->smarty->display( $view . '.tpl' );
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00104 }
00105 
00106 class ASO_Display_Smarty_Exception extends ASO_Display_Exception
00107 {}
